Regulatory Capital Components: Common stock plus related surplus_net of treasury stock
Common Equity Tier 1 capital (CET1) before adjustments and deductions
Less: Goodwill (net of associated deferred taxes)
Deferred tax assets (DTAs) that arise from net operating loss and tax credit carry-forwards_net of any related valuation allowances and net of DTLs
Total adjustments and deductions from Common Equity Tier 1 Capital
Allowance for credit losses including in Tier 2 capital
CECL transition provision for allowance for credit losses
